textHelp: 'where is keywords' to search for top 5 most relevant results and see availability
'news' to manually invoke the check of not holdable list status (only returns in items)
'add keywords' to add to not holdable list
'remove keywords' to remove from not holdable list
'due barcode pin' to get due dates for items checked out
'holds barcode pin' to get hold position for items requested
'now branch keywords' to search for available titles at a branch out of the 500 most popular results
'branches' to see abbreviation and (id) per branch
'hours branch' to see hours per branch
'hours' to see hours for home branch in config
apiHelp: '/find/[keywords url encoded]' to search for top 5 most relevant results and see availability
'/news' to manually invoke the check of not holdable list status (only returns in items)
'/add/[keywords url encoded]' to add to not holdable list
'/remove/[keywords url encoded]' to remove from not holdable list
'/due/[barcode]/[pin]' to get due dates for items checked out
'/holds/[barcode]/[pin]' to get hold position for items requested
'/now/[branch id]/[keywords url encoded]' to search for available titles at a branch out of the 500 most popular results
'/branches' to see abbreviation and (id) per branch
'/hours/[branch id]' to see hours per branch
'/hours' to see hours for home branch in config
